categories: Category:Commerce and labor guilds and unions
Category:Royal Armaments Guild of Charubah products

nodes.text: The Royal Charubah Armaments Guild, also known as Charubah Industries, was a Hapan weapons manufacturing group. Located on the technologically advanced planet of Charubah, their greatest claim to fame was the development of the Gun of Command, a pistol that could control the mind of whatever its target.
